programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of his rogue former colleague Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover John Woo - Director Tom Cruise - Ethan Hunt Dougray Scott - Sean Ambrose Thandiwe Newton - Nyah Hall Ving Rhames - Luther Stickel Richard Roxburgh - Hugh Stamp John Polson - Billy Baird Rade Serbedzija - Dr Nekhorvich Anthony Hopkins - Mission Commander Swanbeck.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview: May 2025
programme.desc: A look ahead to the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: Not sure what to watch next? Then discover some of the greatest British Sky Originals. From Four Kids and It to SAS Red Notice, there's something here for everyone.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Superhero action adventure starring Dakota Johnson. While on a dangerous job, New York paramedic Cassie Webb has a near-fatal accident and develops precognitive powers. programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. When blonde and bubbly Barbie experiences a series of sudden crises, she must leave Barbieland to track down her human owner and make things right. But the adoring Ken follows her to Los Angeles where he discovers something called the "patriarchy" and develops some radical ideas.. programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt. After a shocking on-set accident, stuntman Colt Seavers is taking some time out from the movie game. programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell. Five years after a storm-chasing tragedy involving a group of her friends, meteorologist Kate joins a team investigating unusual tornado activity in Oklahoma. programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Supernatural horror comedy sequel starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega. In the decades since narrowly avoiding marriage to the lascivious demon Betelgeuse, Lydia Deetz has found fame as a TV occultist. Her teenage daughter, Astrid, is sceptical and distant, still mourning the death of her father some years before. But then Astrid has her own perilous brush with the beyond - and her despairing mother realises there's only one being who can help her out.. programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Paul Walker and Vin Diesel. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Chris Pratt and Jennifer Lawrence. programme.title: Ready Player One

programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Al Pacino gives one of his finest performances as the courageous cop who goes undercover to expose NYPD corruption. Intense thriller based on a true story. (1973)(125 mins).

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter. (1950)(88 mins).

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: When aliens send a female android diplomat to Earth, she accidentally lands in war-torn Palestine, where she meets a friendly British journalist. (1987)(78 mins).

programme.title: The Way of the Dragon (1972)
programme.desc: A martial artist decides to protect his relatives from a syndicate, so the syndicate assigns a renowned martial artist to defeat him. Bruce Lee stars. (1972)(95 mins).

programme.title: Italian Job, The (1969)
programme.desc: Ex-convict Michael Caine hatches an audacious plan to steal $4 million, involving a bus, two Jaguars and, of course, three Mini Coopers. Comic adventure. Flashing images. (1969)(95 mins).

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientists investigate a jungle expedition with the help of a sign language-savvy gorilla. Adventure with Tim Curry. With strong language, violence and flashing images. (1995)(104 mins).

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: Theatrical version of Ridley Scott's classic sci-fi thriller, with Harrison Ford as a troubled cop on the trail of fugitive androids. Based on a novel by Philip K. Dick. (1982)(113 mins).

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man (1992)
programme.desc: A simple-minded gardener is transformed into a genius, but plots his bloody revenge when he realises he's been exploited. Sci-fi horror with Jeff Fahey and Pierce Brosnan. (1992)(108 mins).

programme.title: The Sugarland Express
programme.desc: Goldie Hawn busts her husband out of jail, kidnaps a cop and goes on the run in Texas. Crime drama from Steven Spielberg. Violence/flashing images/stereo sound only. (1974)(106 mins).

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Liam Neeson stars as Oskar Schindler, who tries to save Jewish workers from the Nazis. Violence/strong language/mature themes/flashing images. (1993)(188 mins).

programme.title: Gorillas In The Mist
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Sigourney Weaver stars as Dian Fossey, the US scientist who dedicated her life to studying and protecting the mountain gorillas of Rwanda. Drama. (1988)(125 mins).

programme.title: Italian Job, The (1969)
programme.desc: Ex-convict Michael Caine hatches an audacious plan to steal $4 million, involving a bus, two Jaguars and, of course, three Mini Coopers. Comic adventure. Flashing images. (1969)(95 mins).

programme.title: The Way of the Dragon (1972)
programme.desc: A martial artist decides to protect his relatives from a syndicate, so the syndicate assigns a renowned martial artist to defeat him. Bruce Lee stars. (1972)(95 mins).

programme.title: The Cinema List: The 90s
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decade's greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: The Sons Of Katie Elder
programme.desc: John Wayne and Dean Martin star in this tale of four brothers who set out to avenge the death of their father and reclaim the family ranch. All-action Western. (1965)(117 mins).

programme.title: Out Of Africa
programme.desc: Plantation owner Meryl Streep falls head over heels for Robert Redford's big game hunter, in this heart-wrenching epic set in early 20th Century Kenya. (1985)(150 mins).

programme.title: Field Of Dreams
programme.desc: Moving fantasy starring Kevin Costner as a Iowa farmer who, in answer to a mystical voice, turns his cornfield into a baseball pitch, with miraculous results. (1989)(101 mins).

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince Of Thieves
programme.desc: Kevin Costner is the hero leading a peasant revolt against the evil Sheriff of Nottingham (Alan Rickman). Stirring adventure with Morgan Freeman. Strong language/violence. (1991)(138 mins).

programme.title: A League Of Their Own
programme.desc: In WWII, while the men are on the battlefield, the women are on the playing field. Tom Hanks and Madonna star in a feelgood baseball tale. (1992)(122 mins).

programme.desc: Supernatural horror comedy sequel starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega. In the decades since narrowly avoiding marriage to the lascivious demon Betelgeuse, Lydia Deetz has found fame as a TV occultist. programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03).

programme.title: WTA Final: Indian Wells

programme.title: ATP Final: Madrid
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper steps on court for the Madrid Open final aiming to lift his second Masters 1000 crown, as the 23-year-old faces 14th seed Casper Ruud for the first time. (04.05).

programme.title: 1963 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 25/5/63. Played at a fully roofed Wembley for the first time, Leicester had achieved the double over United in the league, so the Reds went into this game as the underdogs.

programme.title: 1968 European Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 29/5/68. Matt Busby had led his side from the tragedy of Munich to the brink of glory at Wembley, could they beat Benfica and be crowned kings of Europe?

programme.title: 1977 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 21/5/77. FA Cup Final. United were the underdogs and out to spoil Liverpool's chances of a treble.

programme.title: 1983 FA Cup Final Replay
programme.desc: United Archives 21/5/83. Brighton had produced a shock to take the first game to a replay, but Bryan Robson and the lads had other ideas this time around.

programme.title: 1985 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 18/5/85. United take on current holders & league champions Everton in a game remembered for the first player ever to be sent off in a Cup Final and a piece of Norman Whiteside magic.

programme.title: 1990 FA Cup Final Replay
programme.desc: United Archives 17/5/90. Hard to live up to the first meeting between these teams five days earlier, United faced Crystal Palace again aiming to secure Alex Ferguson's first major trophy.

programme.title: 1991 CWC Final: v Barcelona
programme.desc: United Archives 15/5/91. United travel to Feyenoord Stadium in Rotterdam to face Barcelona in the 1991 European Cup Winners Cup Final.

programme.title: 1994 FA Cup Final: v Chelsea
programme.desc: United Archives 14/5/94. United were aiming to become the fourth club in the 20th Century to complete The Double & for the first time in the club's history as they took on Chelsea in the FA Cup final.

programme.title: 1996 FA Cup Final: v Liverpool
programme.desc: United Archives 11/5/96. United were aiming to become the first club to win the FA Cup 9 times in this final against Liverpool and also win the League and Cup double on two occasions.

programme.title: 1999 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 22/5/99. Having already won the league, and with Bayern Munich in Barcelona still to come, this FA Cup Final v Newcastle was the second leg of United's quest to win the Treble.

programme.title: Top 20 Goals at Wembley
programme.desc: Stop scrolling, take 10 minutes out and watch United's top 20 goals at Wembley Stadium.

programme.title: PL Match: v Aston Villa 24/25 (H)
programme.desc: Full coverage of the Premier League game against Aston Villa.

programme.title: 2004 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 22/5/04. United were clear favourites to lift the FA Cup when they faced Millwall at the Millennium Stadium in May 2004.

programme.title: 2006 League Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 26/2/06. United hadn't won the League Cup since 1992 but travelled to the Millennium Stadium in Cardiff hopeful of victory over Wigan.

programme.title: 2008 UCL Final: v Chelsea
programme.desc: United Archives 21/5/08. 50 years after Munich, 40 years on from Wembley and 9 years after Barcelona, United take on Chelsea bidding to rule Europe for the third time.

programme.title: 2010 League Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 28/2/10. The final of the 2010 Carling Cup and United hope to retain the trophy they won 12 months earlier as they took on Aston Villa at Wembley.

programme.title: Top 20 Goals at Wembley
programme.desc: Stop scrolling, take 10 minutes out and watch United's top 20 goals at Wembley Stadium.

programme.title: EFL Cup Final v Soton 16/17
programme.desc: United Archives 26/2/17. The Reds were aiming to lift the first domestic silverware up for grabs in the 2016/17 campaign as they walked out at Wembley to face Claude Puel's Southampton side.

programme.title: EL: Ajax Final 16/17
programme.desc: United Archives 24/5/17. The Reds looked to secure the missing piece of major silverware in their trophy cabinet, as they faced Ajax in the Europa League Final in Stockholm.
